title: Integrated Trigonological Learning and Assessment Design for University Mathematics Education in K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Undergraduate-Level Mathematics Foundations and Basic Understanding of Instructional Methodologies
context.additional_context: Innovative mathematics instruction design and integrated assessment for pre-service/in-service teachers. Implementation of learning and assessment activities in smartphone-based constrained environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply the six design principles of the trialogical learning approach to the context of mathematics education.
Learners can design mobile-based assessment activities that promote participatory growth of learners using formative assessment tools.
Learners can develop and implement sustainable assessment strategies in an integrated online-offline environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
